oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LiStr: Linguistic Structure Induction Tookit
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mareček, David
Straka, Milan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: parsing
unsupervised machine learning
machine translation
grammar induction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This toolkit comprises the tools and supporting scripts for unsupervised induction of dependency trees from raw texts or texts with already assigned part-of-speech tags. There are also scripts for simple machine translation based on unsupervised parsing and scripts for minimally supervised parsing into Universal-Dependencies style.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Charles University, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics (UFAL)
